name: Heart Of Artemisa [BETA TEST]
description:
Heart Of Artemisa is a roguelike dungeon crowler, with action turn base movement.

The principal mechanic is the heartbeat, each movement that the player makes must be thought  in less than 5 seconds or Artemisa will die instantly, the world moves as Artemisa moves.  With procedural generation rooms, puzzles, traps, enemies, and bosses. 

Currently in development

This is a beta test for feedback and bugs, please feel free to comment on any issues you encounter in the game.
